com.scitools.understand

Class Understand

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.scitools.understand.Understand

  • public class Understand
extends java.lang.Object
    This class is the entry point for using the Understand package. All other classes are only valid if returned from functions.

    • Method Detail

      • open

        public static Database open(java.lang.String name)
                     throws UnderstandException
        Open the database with the given name. This is the only way to get a Database object. Possible exceptions messages are:
        • DBAlreadyOpen - only one database may be open at once
        • DBCorrupt - bad database file
        • DBOldVersion - database needs to be rebuilt
        • DBUnknownVersion - database needs to be rebuilt
        • DBUnableOpen - database is unreadable or does not exist
        • NoApiLicense - Understand license required
        A Database must be closed using the close() method in order to release the understand resources. Once a database is closed, it and all associated objects (entities, references ...) become invalid. If you call openDB() more than once for a particular database (not recommended), closing one database will invalidate the other database objects, but you should still call close on each of the other database objects to fully release the memory.
        Parameters:
        name - The absolute filename of the database. Must not be null.
        Returns:
        An accessor to an understand database.
        Throws:
        UnderstandException - If any of the above errors occur.

      • metriclist

        public static java.lang.String[] metriclist(java.lang.String kindstring)
        Return a list of all valid metric names.
        Parameters:
        kindstring - If not null, return only metric names valid for entities that match the kindstring.
        Returns:
        a list of valid metric names.

      • loadNativeLibrary

        public static void loadNativeLibrary()
        Load and initialize the native component of this library. This function is called automatically from the other static methods in this class.
